author: cnbc.com
title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Announces an Investigation Concerning Possible Breaches of Fiduciary Duty by Certain Officers and Directors of TreeHouse Foods, Inc.
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Levi & Korsinsky announces it has commenced an investigation of TreeHouse Foods, Inc. (NYSE:THS) concerning possible breaches of fiduciary duty. On November 3, 2016, TreeHouse Foods announced that it lowered its full-year profit forecast. The Company also announced the closure of a plant in Delta, British Columbia, job cuts at its facility in Battle Creek, Michigan, and the resignation of its President, Chris Silva. The Company’s CFO—who previously announced his retirement—has agreed to stay on as President while TreeHouse Foods looks for Silva’s permanent replacement. To obtain additional information, go to :
http://www.zlkdocs.com/THS-Info-Request-Form-4939
or contact Joseph E. Levi, Esq. either via email at jlevi@levikorsinsky.com or by telephone at (212) 363-7500, toll-free: (877) 363-5972. There is no cost or obligation to you .
Levi & Korsinsky is a national firm with offices in New York, Connecticut, California, and Washington D.C. The firm’s attorneys have extensive expertise in prosecuting securities litigation involving financial fraud, representing investors throughout the nation in securities lawsuits and have recovered hundreds of millions of dollars for aggrieved shareholders . For more information, please feel free to contact any of the attorneys listed below. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
